CustomField.description: The source of the funds for this recommendation
CustomField.formula: IF( Recommendation__r.RecommendationTypeName__c = "External transfer in", "Ceding provider", IF( Recommendation__r.RecommendationTypeName__c = "Open product", "N/A", IF( ISPICKVAL(Recommendation__r.PaidBy__c, "Client"), "Client bank account", "Employer")))
CustomField.label: Source of funds
